Highs + Lows from Break

  • Good/bad movie watched?
  • Good/bad meal eaten?
  • Good/bad moment with family member?

Goals for today:

  • Getting to know someone new >> River of Life
  • Face Card Mock Up
  • Roles picked out
  • First recording

Rules of Engagement

  • No meaness
    (e.g. no eye-rolling, shooting other people down)

  • Listen & ask questions

  • What's said in this room stays here.

  • No recordings shared without permission.

  • When recording, don't tap, fidget, interrupt.
  • No random air dropping.

Walk and Talk ‚Äî Come back in 10m.

Go schmooze with someone from another grade who you haven't spoken with ‚Äî find out a story that you'll share when you get back. Both people should "interview" each other.

Possible Questions:

  • What's they're name?
  • What do they like to do in their spare time?
  • Favorite books, movies, food, animal, etc.
  • Pet peeves
  • Pets, siblings
  • How they feel about high school? What's good, what's not as good?

Profile Pics

  • With partner, choose still photo (can be your face, an object or something you love)
  • On phone, make sure that photo is in shape of a SQUARE

Modify Photo to look like Drawing

Download the free "Toon Camera" App

Toon Camera ‚Äî Drawing effect!

Send me the photos

  • Save me as a contact: Molly Josephs 917-584-9839
  • Text me with you/partners name, last initial, ORIGINAL and MODIFIED photos

Mock up your "on hover" effect

The point is to add an effect that says something about who you are or your aesthetic

Ideas for Effects

  • Changing into your pet
  • You turn into your favorite cartoon character
  • Your favorite food pops up
  • Favorite song plays
  • If you like the ocean, your photo changes into same photo but underwater

Add any combo of these effects...

  • Change image Size (see Cloe)
  • Change image Color (see Taylor/Penelope)
  • Spin/rotate back and forth
  • Song/sound effect plays
  • Change image to something else:
    • same photo but different effect in Toon Camera
    • same photo but it's drawn on, so it looks like drawings magically appear
    • baby photo
    • photo of your favorite food, flower, activity, cartoon character, emoji, etc.

Text Me:

  • A CLEAR (e.g.no shadows, well-lit, not cut-off) photo of your mock up
  • Whatever other images/sounds you're using ‚Äî image you want to change into, image you want to appear in your photo, song/sound effect you want to play, etc.

Lunch

Back of your card ‚Äî Ideas!

  • 1-2 sentences about yourself ‚Äî things you like, what you care about, what you value, etc.
  • Something related to your effect
  • Some bullet-point stats about you: Age, favorite emoji, least-favorite condiment, favorite childhood TV show, etc.
  • A haiku
  • Rupi Kaur style poem
  • Favorite quote

Text Me:

  • First name, last initial
  • The text you want to use for the back of your card. If you have a specific font you'd like me to use, let me know.

First Day Stories

  • Go off on a walk with someone you haven't really talked to yet.
  • Talk about good, horrible, embarassing, disappointing first days. Thing of at least one story that you may be willing to share with the group

A first of mine...

Examples: The first time/day you...

  • Played in a [X] game?
  • Performed with your band
  • Played your favorite video game
  • You were an older sibling
  • First day of high/middle school?
  • First day you said something to a crush you felt shy to talk to
  • You changed your X habit

River of Life (1hr)

A drawing of your life... so far

River of Life Shareout

  • Partner w/someone
    • you don't know well
    • in another grade
    • make sure one person has iphone
  • Share RoL for 5m as they're totally silent. Then ask questions.
  • Swap!
